name: Old Discord Colors [V1.0.1]
description: Don't like the colors of the Discord redesign? Then you're in luck! This style changes those green buttons and dark search bars back to the old colors.

user.name: Lekrkoekj
user.about:
Hi I'm Lekrkoekj! 
I mostly make Dark Themes for a lot of sites on here. If you like any of my styles,  be sure to give feedback on them.
